name: .USR File Extension
summary: Learn about .USR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Music file used by SmartMusic, a band, orchestra, and vocal music practice application; contains a customization of a SmartMusic Title; custom changes include altering tempos and cutting measures.

content: Open a title, click Customize, and choose an existing customization or add a new one by clicking "New Customization."
Right-click your customization, select Export..., name the file, choose the save location, and click Save.
To import your USR file, open a title, click Customize, select "Import," navigate to the location of your USR file, and click Open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
